body:
i dont understand why map such as venomous tdm are in nebula? shouldnt they belong in nexus?

TDM maps are very good but it would be more logical to put them in nexus

will this happen?

title: TDM be taken out of nebula

replies.body: We're planning to add TDM rotations, and they would include: Actrix, Azeron, Castle Adventure 2, ClayTDM, Cleyra, Eclipse, Fantasy, Gladiator, Illegal Office, Meltinidus Frostlight, Periculum, Pulas Terra, Rapture, Titans, Venomous TDM and Zao.

replies.body: I hate TDM's it does not deliver fair game play to most players, It rely's on players to have Ultra good Ping (Avicus server response time to their computer) and a big deal of it is just luck.. i would not like to hinder my KD ratio on some kid that doesn't need skill to kill me. all is said. end of story.
